RandomEvent - Class in events
Random event superclass, This class represents a randomly occurring event which could happen during a week's end.
RandomEvent(int) - Constructor for class events.RandomEvent
Constructor
RandomEventInfo - Class in events
Random Event GUI Info This class is intended to act as a 'parcel' of information to be instantiated at each random event and passed through to the GUI It is done like this so that random events can be easily stored in a list and presented to the user once at a time by the GUI.
RandomEventInfo(String, String, String) - Constructor for class events.RandomEventInfo
Constructor method
